com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.stars

Class DistantStar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solarsystem.PointInSpace
      • com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.SpaceObject
        • com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.stars.Star
          • com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.stars.DistantStar

  • public class DistantStar
extends Star
    This class models a distant star object. This class inherits from the Star superclass to inherit star properties and behaviours.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DistantStar(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String colour, double diameter, double distance, double angle, SpaceObject objectOrbiting, double speed)
      Calling the Star superclass constructor initialises member variables for the distant star.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void move(SolarSystem system)
      Updates the current angle of the distant star according to it's speed.

      • Methods inherited from class com.solarsystem.spaceobjects.SpaceObject

        draw, getColour, getDiameter, getName, getObjectOrbiting, getSpeed, setDiameter, setSpeed

      • Methods inherited from class com.solarsystem.PointInSpace

        getAngle, getDistance, setAngle, setDistance

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DistantStar

        public DistantStar(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String colour,
                   double diameter,
                   double distance,
                   double angle,
                   SpaceObject objectOrbiting,
                   double speed)
        Calling the Star superclass constructor initialises member variables for the distant star.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the distant star.
        colour - The colour of the distant star.
        diameter - The diameter of the distant star.
        distance - The distance of the distant star from the point which it orbits.
        angle - The current angle the distant star is on its orbit path.
        objectOrbiting - The object about which the distant star orbits.
        speed - The speed of the distant star.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(SolarSystem system)
        Updates the current angle of the distant star according to it's speed.
        Overrides:
        move in class SpaceObject
        Parameters:
        system - The solar system to draw the object in.
